entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:49 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:49 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 6:49 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
